website_summaries.verdict: An easy way to make simple chocolates more classy and personal.
pros: An affordable and adorable way to dress up chocolate kiss candies or other candies
Available in multiple colors and designs
Stickers can be used on nearly anything, not just chocolates
Pack of 216 sits at a low price point

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute party favor
customer_reviews.text: They are so lovely! I absolutely love them. Be sure to know that these are just labels for some reason I thought it was delivered already placed on the chocolate but either way it only took me 10-15 to get the all on the kisses
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding shower extras!
customer_reviews.text: These little stickers are the perfect size to use on candies such as ‘kisses’, Reese’s cups, etc. We used them for a wedding shower, they were perfect. Rather than plain candy, we used these to fancy up our bowls of candy on the tables.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Deupree

customer_reviews.title: So happy now! Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Updating my original 2 star review - after contacting the company, they apologized for my not being satisfied with the product and asked for a photo, I sent it and they emailed back immediatly and said they were sending out new stickers. those arrived and were perfect! Excellent customer service on their part! Very happy now. thank you!!! Former review- I love these and the concept but I’m really upset the ones that are supposed to say “from the new mr and mrs” are off center so they actually say “ROM the new mr & mrs”. The ones that don’t say rom have the F almost cut off. So disappointing! I hope you make right about this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: USING FOR NOVEMBER RUSTIC WEDDING
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive way to add something cute to your rustic wedding without breaking the bank! We don't believe in having your name on everything at the wedding. We know who we are and everyone invited to the wedding should know who we are too. Arrived on time and not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: New Orleans Lady

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Did someone really think they were getting actual chocolate kisses with the stickers for this price? Now that would have been a deal! The stickers were easy to apply and you could use them for other candy too.
customer_reviews.author: AlmostAlwaysAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They were all printed well and went on easily. Perfect little addition to my favor boxes.
customer_reviews.author: angelsvoice28

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived perfect and just what was wanting! Can't wait to see what guest think of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rauls

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Product came out great! Should have order 2 sheets of stickers though !
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: These stickers are fun.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to put cute stickers on the bottom of Kisses. I also had allot of extras so we went CrAzY and put them on the bottoms of peanut butter cups (bite size), & mint patties. Perfect for our Candy/Sweet Table at our Wedding. Anyone can put these stickers on any fun size wrapped chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our wedding reception
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our wedding reception. They super cute and fit on a Hershey’s kiss perfectly. I’d recommend them for sure
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Strong Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: They stick well to the bottom of the Hershey kisses, so much that I could not move them after sticking them down. Nicely printed and many stickers. I used them for my wedding favors
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea. Had to sort into 3 dishes so we could put the correct 3 together each time. Most guests didn’t even notice as you open kisses from the top down. I would still buy again as they put a smile on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Folded on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these twice first time I loved them they are adorable 2nd time they were folded and now 2 rows are unusable
customer_reviews.author: Corie

customer_reviews.title: cool little stickers for a wedding!
customer_reviews.text: i diged these stickers for the chocolate kisses and the font is legible and can see clearly!
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I planned on placing on the bottom of kiss candies but forgot to buy them so I ended up placing them on 3 oz bottles as a adult party favor. I received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Not the stickiest
customer_reviews.text: These are not the stickiest. I placed them on plastic tubes and they aren’t adhering well on the sides even after several presses. Some of the printing is off center but all are readable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful party favors
customer_reviews.text: I put these stickers on hershey kisses and scattered them on the tables at my wedding reception. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a great idea, but poor Amazon shipping made them unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 packs of wood and 1 pack of green for an event project. The green ones were shipped in such a way that they were damaged and I need all 3 packs to complete the project. There was no time to reorder so I ended up returning them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenna

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this last Saturday for my client's wedding table and they loved it! wish it a little cheaper :D
customer_reviews.author: RheineEgD

customer_reviews.title: Dont stick well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wedding and I was not impressed. They dont stick too well.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Knapp Jones

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very cute and give the favors a little extra
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa smull

customer_reviews.title: They looked great!
customer_reviews.text: They look great. The stickers stayed on just fine. I used them on kisses and Reese peanut butter cups. Every one liked them.
customer_reviews.author: IH2003

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design of the stickers
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of the stickers. The logos are very cute however, I didn’t like the way they were printed. They came on basically regular printer paper and were very prone to tearing. I had ordered black ones prior and they came in sticker form with the glossy finish. I was expecting the same and the baby blue didn’t have the same finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these... I put them on the bottom of Hershey's kisses... Looks amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like though.
customer_reviews.text: Read the full info. Comes in sheets. Labels only so you have to stick it on individually. Looks like though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely beautiful and I loved the writing on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re perfect and adorable
customer_reviews.text: They’re adorable and they fit perfectly on the kisses we bought. They’re fun and look great abd they work great as wedding favors.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these were great. One sheet was a little off center, but it wasn't very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: dandan11

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make the favors for my wedding. People loved them! Everyone asked me where I got the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Simple mistake
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute however the sticker was backwards. Which means the paper was my labels and the sticker was just the white back I couldn’t use them obviously. But they are getting my refund so it’s not big deal
customer_reviews.author: shelby scott

customer_reviews.title: Hershey kisses labels
customer_reviews.text: Came on a sheet, easy to apply. Nice vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Pete

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: easy to stick on, work great to dress up kisses and hugs
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good stickers
customer_reviews.text: Stickers were nice and stayed on candy. I don’t think anyone really noticed at the reception. At least nothing was said about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jorhme

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect touch to our little favors. Dainty and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Son's rehearsal dinner!
customer_reviews.text: These work great easy to use and just as depicted here!
customer_reviews.author: K. Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Made a statement with Hershey’s kisses. Bride and groom loved them, as well as the guest thought they were so awesome! Was a hit !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: True to size and color
customer_reviews.text: These stickers were just as cute in person as I expected! The color and size were true to the description and everyone loved the little colorful touch on the candy! The most work was putting every sticker on every piece of candy invididually but the end product was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Friend

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Bridemaids will have fun sticking them on the bottom of 200 Hershey Kisses.
customer_reviews.author: Angeloyd

customer_reviews.title: Wedding kisses.
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to choose wrapping colors. Used for daughters wedding. Added stickers to the bottom very cute. Might should work on quality control. MANY of the wrappers damaged and can’t use them to give to guest.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great effect for reception!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute effect for my son's reception! It was even fun for all of us to get together before hand and put the stickers on while we watched a movie. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Biesinger

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of the labels that I ordered. They are perfect. They are going to be just that special touch that I am looking for at the wedding shower and the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Bride

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used them at my brother’s wedding. Everyone loves kisses and they thought the stickers on them were really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came of the paper easy. Stuck to the kisses well so far
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Made our favors look more elegant, added a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I do recommend this product for last minute wedding favors. I just wish they had more color to choose from and a customized option.
customer_reviews.author: Gem Dadizon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These stickers were perfect! A few of them were creased in shipping but other that than they were exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came right on time! Just as pictured, can’t wait to stick them on our thank you favors.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Being happy during my wedding process this was a last minute nite mare
customer_reviews.text: The product shows and describes that the candy comes with the stickers. In stead I got a week before my wedding a lot of stickers and no candy to put in the goody bags.
customer_reviews.author: T L

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I got lots of compliments on these and the colors are were perfect! Would purchase them again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Willemina

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: was super excited to order these stickers and for our big day
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We put these stickers on the bottom of Hershey's kisses and gave them out as wedding favors. They stuck on great and are a good quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an added touch to my wedding
customer_reviews.text: Just as described.. printed well and sticks to the kisses perfectly. Great product for an added touch to my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These will be great for my wedding. And fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to attach to Hershey Kisses as a wedding favor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Love these stickers!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stickers, I ordered the ones that were personalized also for my daughter's wedding . Turned out perfect! Most definitely order again :) :)
customer_reviews.author: delmethric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers were really nice used with the Hershey's kisses I purchased for my daughter's bridal shower!! Easy to peel and stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Colson

customer_reviews.title: So excited
customer_reviews.text: These go great with my colors for my wedding. Love them cant wait to stick them on the kisses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun wedding favor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stickers. Easy to remove from paper and super cute. Got several compliments about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for your wedding!
customer_reviews.text: Theses labels were awesome! They arrived right on time and were easy to apply. Everyone at the wedding simply loved them! I would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: brlnut68

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for our wedding. Easy to stick on, looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only received one sheet and this does not look like royal blue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three sheets of royal blue for our wedding that will take place in four days. I only received one sheet and this does not look like royal blue. It looks like a navy blue:black color. I can’t even use these. I’m so dissatisfied with the color and the fact that I only received one when I clearly ordered three sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Leija

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: The shipping method being in a flimsy cellophane sleeve did not protect the stickers from being bent. Almost the entire section of “from the new Mr&Mrs” is bent and the sticker has white crease lines or some were actually peeled off and stuck to other stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Perfecf
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the favors I had for my wedding. Put them in the white mesh bags and turned out classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Súper cute & easy to used
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast & they’re so many that is worth the but
customer_reviews.author: Maria Machetes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PErfect for my brother’s wedding. Stickers fit Hershey kisses and really hold up well!

customer_reviews.title: Nice and well designed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and great value!!! I used them for my wedding tables and they looked super cute!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Actually ordered again and they were perfect for my best friends wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lorick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wedding favors!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my last-minute wedding favor idea. The stickers were great quality and came as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Sanders

customer_reviews.title: 214 what a joke
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive 216 stickers I didn't even receive 100 stickers! Highly upset about this
customer_reviews.author: kelly Howard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are stickers! Candy sold separately keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The color is way different then the color u posted 🤔
customer_reviews.author: jenifer smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item to use for away type of special occasion like birthdays, holidays, events, baptism, weddings etc. I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pissed customer!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Pissed off! I ordered the ivory wedding labels a quantity of 2. I received today a quantity of two happy birthday penguin labels! Are you kidding me? That's completely opposite of what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, nice quality and easy to use! Everyone loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great label, perfect for kisses as a favor - would definitely order them again

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Printing looked nice. Just wish there were more for the price.

customer_reviews.title: 75 of each sticker.
customer_reviews.text: Theses are wonderful. Used them in gift boxes at our wedding :) very nice

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Printing of the stickers was very off from center. Much different than previous orders from this company.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and look great
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for the rustic wedding. Easy to apply and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Jan P

customer_reviews.title: Well this order got messed up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 sheets of the wedding stickers. I get two correct sheets. And one football sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were candies they are just stickers POOR ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stickers are so cute.
customer_reviews.text: Please disregard my previous review..... it was the wrong product and should be disregarded. This product was 2 sheets of stickers to label our Hershey's kisses with wedding greetings. They were very easy to peel off and apply to the candy. These will look nice on the tables. We loved them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and lots of stickers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had already ordered some other stickers from Andaz Press for my wedding and wanted some others to throw in my mix of yellow and grey colors, these hit the mark. The fit was perfect, I had no issues with any mis-printing (any white showing up around the edges of the stickers). I would highly recommend. If I have a need for more stickers like this in the future, I'll be back to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: M.C. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: cute for wedding favors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter decided to elope but was talked into letting the family celebrate with her so we only had two weeks to come up with a favor to give the relatives. I would have loved to have them personalized but my time frame was small. Anyway - they turned out beautiful and I loved them so much I rushed to have a second set sent to me. Hershey kisses are favorites around here. Would definitely buy again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Marie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and simple!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I put the stickers on mints and put them in a little box for party favors.
customer_reviews.author: ChelsieK28

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughters wedding colors were lavender and mint green, so the were perfect together on Hershey kisses.

customer_reviews.title: So cute. We love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and worth buying for a wedding. Or ur wedding.

customer_reviews.title: Great for favors
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Used these for my wedding reception favors and they stuck great. Whatever adhesive they used is great and none fell off

customer_reviews.title: Great for Parties
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great addition for the chocolate kisses to give out at a wedding, graduation birthday etc. The color was good and the imprint was readable.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and perfect! Arrived must quicker than expected too, by about 4 or 5 days! Pleased with this purchase! I got the ones with the roses 🌹 ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Annah Bunn

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box was delivered and not protected. Our shipment was soaked inside and out. Stickers were great but very poor delivery

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! I made favors for my son's wedding, which was this past Saturday. Everyone loved them. Very easy to use, which was great, because I stuck 450 of those little things on kisses and hugs. lol Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Mccallister

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this item 5 stars but it was delivered bent and creased. It could be packaged better. Luckily because they were stickers they laid down smoothly when applied to the candies. They are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: these were cute and perfect for a last minute wedding
customer_reviews.text: these were cute and perfect for a last minute wedding. sticking them all on was awful...and some didnt want to stuick right away, but all in all, they were worth it

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute! We did have to order more, it just comes with a single sheet.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that the stickers would not stay on the kisses but they stayed on perfectly. Never lost a one! Good product!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!

customer_reviews.title: Adds a nice detail.

product_meta.title: Andaz Press Chocolate Drop Labels Stickers, Wedding Hugs & Kisses from The New Mr. & Mrs, Floral Roses, 216-Pack, for Bridal Shower Engagement Hershey's Kisses Party Favors Decor
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: 216 round stickers designed by Andaz Press (72 of each design). Fits Hershey's Kisses. DOES NOT INCLUDE CANDY.
SIZE: 0.75-inch wide circle. Properties: Matte finish. Digitally printed on high quality paper, with vibrant colors. Actual product color may vary slightly due to differences in monitor settings.
PERFECT for decorating Hershey's kisses party favors, or sealing envelopes, favor boxes and bags.

Â Andaz Press. Original design by Andaz Press Â. All rights reserved. Search Andaz Press for matching party products, including gift tags, favor labels, cupcake wrappers and toppers, chocolate labels, party signs and banners.

FLAT RATE SHIPPING: Fill your cart with Andaz Press items, and pay ONE LOW SHIPPING RATE. Expedited and 2-day shipping also available! All orders, including custom, ship within 1-2 business days from California.
